channel.title: nginx to load balance your website on Thoughts, Views & More...
channel.description: Recent content in nginx to load balance your website on Thoughts, Views & More...

item.title: Install Nginx and Configure Load Balancing for Heavy Traffic
item.description: Load Balancing is the mechanism which will balance the load upon server towards several servers which ultimately can handle heavy traffic. I will show you the basic configurations with normal HTML based webpages only but it will help you to build for PHP based websites.
